page.name: Dragon Molt
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This strand of dragon scales must have been lost when the growing dragon lost it's seasonal skin. See? There's more than one way to skin a  dragon?

properties.name: Dragon Molt
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This strand of dragon scales must have been lost when the growing dragon lost it's seasonal skin. See? There's more than one way to skin a  dragon?

page.name: A Cold Reception
page.description: Rumors from the citizens of Dragesvard say that this cave was once home to one of the Great Dragons. Galanoth needs you to investigate the area and see what you can come up with.

properties.name: A Cold Reception
properties.description: Rumors from the citizens of Dragesvard say that this cave was once home to one of the Great Dragons. Galanoth needs you to investigate the area and see what you can come up with.
properties.complete: The dragon's vault was empty except for a locket from Galanoth's childhood. It seems that this dragon... Akriloth... and Galanoth have some history together.
